articles.author: Molly Davidson
articles.title: US man shares clever AirTag trick that Apple never explains when you buy it - supercarblondie.com
articles.description: US tech creator reveals a simple AirTag setup trick Apple doesn’t explain, plus a small habit that makes trackers far more useful day to day
articles.content:
The Apple AirTag is marketed as a dead-simple tracker, the kind you set once and forget.
But like a lot of Apple gear, some of its best features need to be sought out.
Now a US tech YouTuber says y… [+2623 chars]
